text: Zhizn' v etom mire - lish' tol'ko vremennyye uslady - zabava i igra dlya neurazumevshikh, slovno koroten'kaya detskaya igra. Poistine, budushchiy mir - eto istinnoye, sovershennoye, vechnoye obitalishche. Eto - tvordaya istina, kotoruyu dolzhny by postich' eti lyudi (neveruyushchiye), yesli by razumeli
